generator:
1 { topicOf(W, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- workshop(W).
1 { scheduled(W, R, Sl) : room(R), slot(Sl) } 1 :- workshop(W).

hard_constraints.description: Please ensure that no two workshops are scheduled in the same room at the same time, as rooms cannot be shared.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R, Sl), scheduled(W2, R, Sl), W1 != W2.

hard_constraints.description: To maintain the venue's policy, we must limit the use of each room to no more than two sessions across the entire day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- room(R), #count { W, Sl : scheduled(W, R, Sl) } > 2.

hard_constraints.description: The DevOps workshops are restricted strictly to the midday time slot; they cannot be scheduled in the morning or afternoon.
Due to equipment requirements, workshops focusing on Data must not be placed in Room 3.
We must prevent UI and Data workshops from occurring at the same time, regardless of which room they are in.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, _, Sl), scheduled(W2, _, Sl), topicOf(W1, "UI"), topicOf(W2, "Data").

hard_constraints.description: To ensure a diverse agenda, we require that at least one workshop for every topic is included in the final schedule.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
topic_represented(T) :- scheduled(W, _, _), topicOf(W, T).
:- topic(T), not topic_represented(T).

soft_constraints.description: In the interest of efficiency, we should try to avoid leaving room-time slots empty whenever possible.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("idle_slot", R, Sl, 1) :- room(R), slot(Sl), not scheduled(_, R, Sl).

global_objective: #minimize { P, N, R, Sl : penalty(N, R, Sl, P) }.
